TITLE: NATIONAL LOTTERY

CAMPAIGN: EUROMILLIONS

THE PROJECT

This was a piece I worked on for National Lottery. I was given the task of taking creatives previously built by another agency and converting them into fully fledged dynamic banners. It was a really challenging project as I had an incredibly tight deadline and I had to familiarise myself with the previous agencies files.
The client wanted certain aspects of the creative to remain the same whilst implementing new dynamic capabilties. I worked up the option of toggling from 3 to 4 frames along with the possibility of flipping from live copy to an image on each frame. This campaign contained an abundance of testing to make sure everything worked as expected.

INVOLVEMENT

  • LEAD DEVELOPER ON PROJECT
  • JAVASCRIPT
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • BROWSER TESTING
  • FILE-SIZE MANAGEMENT
  • DOUBLECLICK STUDIO
  • GOOGLE SHEETS
